job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Position: Data Scientist <br>Work Location: Seattle Washington 98109<br>Duration: 12 Months Contract <br>Onsite role <br><br><br>BS degree with 4+ years of experience, a M.Sc. degree with 2+ years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science, Bioinformatics or similar fields.<br>Experience with APIs, or ability to quickly learn how to use them (e.g. R httr or Python requests)<br>Experienced in data visualization and analytics
